scenes.background: [Monica] sighs and looks at you, discussing the need for reliable solutions.
scenes.description: Bob shakes his head. 'We can't always rely on last-minute fixes. What’s your take on this?'

options.text: We need to have a clear emergency protocol. Let's get everyone’s input on this.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and social skills by involving everyone in the solution, but the motivation to take immediate action is lower.

options.text: I understand the urgency. Maybe we can assign a rotating on-call schedule for such emergencies.
options.analysis: You suggest a practical solution, showing good self-regulation and motivation, but empathy and social skills could be improved.

options.text: I get it, but we also need to respect personal time. Better communication protocols might help.
options.analysis: You emphasize the importance of personal time and suggest communication improvements, showing excellent social skills but lower empathy and emotional perception.
